result.execSummary:
All charges against Marquel Deshon Spooner Sr. in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Marquel Deshon Spooner Sr. is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marquel Deshon Spooner Sr.

records.addlTxt:
Case heard by Judge Rosa, Branch 35 for Judge Havas, Branch 10:
Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquel Deshon Spooner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Final Pretrial held.  Parties advise Court they remain in trial posture.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial on 7/13/2022 at 8:30 am, Courthouse Room 504.
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine

Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquel Deshon Spooner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and jury trial date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquel Deshon Spooner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel was recently appointed and requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal in court.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Case heard off the record.  Court is unable to hear case today.  Parties emailed new court date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with MB
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Marquel Deshon Spooner Sr.
Current: 2906 N 40th St, Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 03-18-2022)
Prior: 10500 West Fond Du Lac Avenue #12, Milwaukee, WI 53224

Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Marquel Deshon Spooner in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquel Deshon Spooner appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
